headline.main: ROOSEVELT TALKS WITH SOVIET AIDES; Military Situation and U.S. Aid Are Topics of Parley With Envoy and Generals VISITORS VOICE PLEASURE Hopkins Meets Stalin Again -- Says He Is More Confident That Hitler Will Lose

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, July 31 -- President Roosevelt discussed today with Constantine A. Oumansky, the Soviet Ambassador, and the Russian military mission now in this country the Russian military situation and United States aid to the Soviet Union.
snippet: WASHINGTON, July 31 -- President Roosevelt discussed today with Constantine A. Oumansky, the Soviet Ambassador, and the Russian military mission now in this country the Russian military situation and United States aid to the Soviet Union....

byline.original: Special to THE NEW YORK TIMES
